name: kaavio
description: Diagram viewer and editor for biological pathways.

scripts.placeholders:dirs: mkdir -p src/drawers/edges src/drawers/filters src/drawers/icons src/drawers/markers src/drawers/styles
scripts.placeholders:icons: echo "import * as React from 'React'; export class Icons extends React.Component<any, any> {render(){return <div />}};" > src/drawers/icons/__bundled_dont_edit__.tsx
scripts.prepare-broken: npm run placeholders && npm run build:dist:node && ./bin/kaavio bundle --build false edges && ./bin/kaavio bundle --build false filters && ./bin/kaavio bundle icons --build false && ./bin/kaavio bundle markers --build false && npm run build && npm run test && npm run expected
scripts.prepare: npm run placeholders && npm run build:dist:node && ./bin/kaavio bundle --build false edges && ./bin/kaavio bundle --build false filters && ./bin/kaavio bundle icons --build false && ./bin/kaavio bundle markers --build false && npm run build
scripts.expected-broken: echo 'Setting expected values for tests' && npm-run-all expected:* && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.expected-broken:gpml: echo "Converting JSON (from GPML test files) to SVG and generating checksums:"; source_dirname=./node_modules/\@wikipathways/gpml/test/2013a; for source_file in $source_dirname/edge-elbow-top2-to-top2.json; do output_file=`echo $source_file | sed s#node_modules/\@wikipathways/gpml/test/2013a#test/expected/json-from-gpml# | sed 's/\.json//'`".svg"; echo "$source_file -> $output_file"; cat "$source_file" | bin/kaavio json2svg -s false | tee "$output_file" | shasum -p -a 1 > "$output_file.sha1sum"; done && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.expected-broken:native: for f in ./test/inputs/*.json; do base_path=`echo "$f" | sed s/.json//`; echo "Converting $f to SVG and generating checksum..."; cat "$f" | bin/kaavio json2svg -s false | shasum -p -a 1 > "$base_path.svg.sha1sum"; done && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test-broken: echo 'get in-browser tests working' && npm run test:checksums
scripts.test-broken:e2e: npm run serve && npm run serve:bundle
scripts.test-broken:checksums: for f in ./test/inputs/*.json; do base_path=`echo "$f" | sed s/.json//`; echo "Verifying checksum for $base_path.svg..."; cat "$f" | bin/kaavio json2svg -s false | shasum -p -a 1 -c "$base_path.svg.sha1sum"; done && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.watch:lib:assets: npm run build:lib:assets && onchange 'src/**' -- npm run build:lib:assets

author: WikiPathways team
